amendment.description: To make available up to $2,000,000 for infrastructure for the Afghanistan military legal system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4900 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4900 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S9092; text: CR S9092) To make available up to $2,000,000 for infrastructure for the Afghanistan military legal system.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4900 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Graham.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4900 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
